@youwol/three-extra - v0.0.2

@youwol/three-extra

Description

Extentions for three.js with some user friendly functionalities.

Documentation

Read online.

Use

To install the required dependencies:

yarn

To build for development:

yarn build:dev

To build for production:

yarn build:prod

To test:

yarn test
